lines.text: [Sanchez is about to kill James]
You could have had everything.
Don't you want to know why?
[Shows Sanchez Felix's lighter, then sets Sanchez on fire]
[M confronts Bond in Key West]
You were supposed to be in Istanbul LAST NIGHT! I'm afraid this unfortunate Leiter business has
[beat]
clouded your judgment! *You have a job to do*! I expect you on a plane this afternoon!
I haven't finished here, sir.
Leave it to the Americans! It's their mess. Let them clear it up.
SIR! They're not going to DO ANYTHING!

[calms down]
I owe it to Leiter. He's put his life on the line for me many times.
Oh SPARE ME this sentimental RUBBISH! He knew the risks.
And his WIFE?
This private vendetta of yours could easily compromise Her Majesty's government. You have an assignment, and I expect you to carry it out *objectively* and *professionally*!
Then you have my resignation, sir!

[incensed]
We're not a country club, 007!
[pause]
Effective immediately, your licence to kill is revoked, and I require you to hand over your weapon. Now. I need hardly remind you that you're still bound by the Official Secrets Act.
I guess it's, uh... a farewell to arms.
Pam, this is Q, my "uncle". Uncle, this is "Miss Kennedy," my "cousin."
Ah! We must be related.
[kisses her]
[Asked why he has a gun]
In my business you prepare for the unexpected.
And what business is that?
I help people with problems.
Problem solver.
More of a problem eliminator.
[Sanchez and his men have caught Lupe in bed with another man]

[to Lupe]
What did he promise you? His heart?
[to Dario]
Give her his heart!
[Dario pulls a knife]

[as the man is being removed]
No. No Franz. I didn't mean any harm.
It's okay, baby. No te preocupes. We all make mistakes.
[produces a whip]
Your escapades are getting more creative.
Por favor, Franz.
Not a word.
[Sanchez whips her while Dario cuts out her lover's heart]
[Bond heads for Pam's bedroom]
Good night, Q.
Sweet dreams, Mr. Bond.
[closes the door on him]

[sighing]
I hope you don't snore, Q.
nobody saw you come in, so nobody has to see you go out.
[Sanchez has just blown up Milton Krest in a decompression chamber full of money, splattering blood all over it]
What about the money, patron?
Launder it.
[Sanchez and Krest have just discovered a lot of money in Krest's pressure chamber]
That's not my money, I swear!
That's right, amigo. It's mine!

[grabs Krest]
You think I'm stupid! HUH! You rip me off then use my own money to PAY someone to KILL ME? You want it so bad? Then TAKE IT!
[kicks Krest into the pressure chamber]
I can get the trucks out! But I don't think I can control the fire!
Forget the fire! Get some cars, we're gonna take the tankers with us!
Wait a minute! This setup cost us $32 million! We've got to try and save it!
I don't give a SHIT about the setup! We've got $500 million in the case, and 20 tonnes of Colombian pure IN THE TANKERS! Now GO HELP HELLER!
But we've got a deal with the Orientals. We've got their money.
I said GO HELP HELLER!
There has been a mistake with my cheque. Look at it! It's *half* the usual amount.
You were very quiet when I was arrested. Remember, you're only president... for life.
[El Presidente takes the cheque and leaves]
[Killifer, who took the bribe, is dangling on a rope over shark-infested water]
There's $2 million in that suitcase. I'll split it with you.

[menacingly]
You earned it. You keep it, Old Buddy!
[Throws the case at him, knocking him into the water]
God, what a terrible waste.
[Bond glares at Sharkey]
Of money.
[Bond stops glaring]
[a fork lift truck bursts through a wall with a Heller impaled on the forks]
Oh, God, it's Heller.
Yeah. Looks like he came to a dead end.
[explosions are heard]
Come on!
In this business, there's a lot of cash. And a lot of people with their hands out.
In a word... bribery.
Exactly. He took the words right out of my pocket.
[Pam is dressed in a white robe, making her look like an angel]

[slowly looks at her]
Ha! Ha! Ha! You're dead!

[raises a gun]
You took the words right out of my mouth!
[shoots him]

[after two of the tanker trucks are destroyed]
BRILLIANT! Well done, Franz! Another eighty-million dollar *write-off*!
Then I guess it's time to start cutting overhead.
[shoots him]
[Felix is being lowered into a pool full of sharks]
I just want you to know that this is nothing personal. It's purely business.
Killing me won't stop anything, Sanchez!
There are worse things than dying, hombre.
[Lowers him into the shark pit]
See you in hell!
No, no. Today is the first day of the rest of your life!
[Sanchez is about to put Bond onto a conveyor leading to a cocaine grinder]
When it gets up to your ankles, you're going to beg to tell me everything. When it gets up to your knees, you'll kiss my ass to kill you.
[Bond sees that Sharkey has been killed]
You'd better find yourself a new lover!
Don't you men know any other way?
It's Sanchez's way! You seem to like it!
Freeze! Over by the trap door, old buddy.
Is this where you put your old buddy Felix?
Not me. Chalk that one up to Sanchez and Krest.
[Bond points a harpoon at the man who killed Sharkey]
Compliments of Sharkey!
[shoots him]

[after telling Krest to keep his mistress on his boat]
Hey. No fooling around with my girl.
Are you kidding? After what you did to that guy in the Islands?
You liked my little Valentine, huh?

[Pam kisses Bond]
Why don't you wait until you're asked?
Why don't you ask me?
[kisses Bond again]
[last lines]
[Bond kisses Pam after jumping into a swimming pool after her]
Why don't you wait until you're asked?
So why don't you ask me?
This is no place for you, Q. Go home.
Oh, don't be an idiot, 007. I know exactly what you're up to, and quite frankly, you're going to need my help. Remember, if it hadn't been for Q Branch, you'd have been dead long ago.
[opens a case]
Everything for a man on holiday. Explosive alarm clock - guaranteed never to wake up anyone who uses it. Dentonite toothpaste - to be used sparingly, the latest in plastic explosive.
I could do with some plastic.

[kissing Bond]
That's a custom, you see. The bride always gets to kiss her best man.
I thought it was the other way around.
Aww...
[kisses him again]
Oh, James, would you mind? Felix is still in the study and we've got to cut this cake.
I'll do anything for a woman with a knife.
[Repeated line]
Bless your heart!
[their boat just died]
Out of Gas. I haven't heard that one in a long time.
Well, they must have hit the fuel line.

[aiming the signiture gun at Sanchez's office window]
Watch the birdy, you bastard.
[Leiter sees the traitor cop]
Killifer?
Sorry, ol' buddy, but two mil's a helluva chunk o' dough.
[after a gunfight with henchmen]

[to Bond]
Hey, observer! You trying to get yourself killed?
If I don't get you back in time for the wedding, I'm a dead man for sure!
Drug dealers of the world, unite!
Where's my wife?
Don't worry. We gave her a nice Honeymooooon.
Local cops got a tip about a warehouse last night. Turned up 500 keys of Colombian pure, couple of stiffs, and a little bit of piece of what used to be Killifer.
Good. At least someone's on the case.
You may be a pal of Leiter's, but I can only cover up so much. The DEA is screaming to know what happened. You know, we... we've got laws in this country, too.
Do you have a law against what they did to Leiter?
[a couple of men arrive to escort Bond]
Look... you're in over your head. This is where it ends, Commander.
[Heller takes an arsenal case, only to be caught by a suspicious Sanchez]
Hey. I was making sure these were secure.
It's a good idea. Take them up to my car.
Of course.
[Sharkey asks about Felix]
How is he?
His left leg's gone below the knee. But they might be able to save his arm.
You can bet it was a chainsaw. Colombians love to use them on informers. Hell, they sell more here than the state of Oregon.
[Rasmussen leaves]
Chainsaw my ass. I know a shark bite when I see one.
[Pam saves Bond from Dario, who is then violently decimated in a crushing machine]
Are you all right?
SWITCH THE BLOODY MACHINE OFF!
There's only one law down there. Sanchez's Law! Plomo o Plata.

[nodding]
Lead or Silver.
[after Bond has introduced Pam as his executive secretary Miss Kennedy]
It's *Ms. Kennedy*. And why can't you be *my* executive secretary?
We're south of the border. It's a man's world.
[Kwang and his Hong Kong agents have captured Bond]
Who would have a signature gun?
James Bond.
[examines the gun]
This is the property of Her Majesty's Government. How did *you* get it?
Piss off!
Who ordered you to kill Sanchez?
No one! He's a rogue agent. I've got orders to bring him back one way or another.
We're Hong Kong Narcotics, you BASTARD!
[grabs Bond]
Sanchez is taking us to the heart of his operations. I've been setting it up for years!
[menacingly]
I just hope that little stunt of yours hasn't scared him off!

[Sanchez' army is at the hideout]
Get me out of these bloody things!
No, Commander. You're a loose cannon on deck.
[prepares syringe]
I'm shipping you straight back to London.
[Bond struggles until Sanchez' army attacks]
Miss Kennedy would you get me a medium-dry Vodka Martini?
Why don't you ask...
Shaken! Not stirred.

[Mocking Lupe Lamora]
I love James so much.
[Normal voice]
I'll be damned if I help him.
Look... Don't judge him too harshly, my dear. Field operatives much often use every means that their disposal to achieve their objectives.
Bullshit!
[first lines]
We have a mid-course deviation. Target heading 036, 126 miles, bearing 062, Havana VOR.
He's landing at Cray Key. Advise Key West Drug Enforcement.
Roger, sir. AWACS to Key West. Key West Drug Enforcement, please come in.
If they hurry, they just might be able to grab the bastard.
[James Bond reluctantly takes Della's garter]
Did I say something wrong?
He was married once. But it was a long time ago.
[a couple of divers arrive with Sharkey's corpse]
Nice work, Clive.
Thanks, Mr. Krest. Guest what? His name was Sharkey.
Bond, James Bond

[after checking an airplane]
No Sanchez.
Damn!

[Bond has just told Sanchez that those who tried to kill him probably came from within his own organization, and that Bond knows this because he used to work for the British government]
You're not going to believe who this guy is.
Former British agent.

[Surprised]
How did you know that?

[Smiles]
Because I know things.
[Demeanour changes]
I want to meet Krest's boat tonight. We'll need a dozen reliable men.
Is there a problem with Krest?
We'll see. And bring Lupe, she was there. He's not going to lie in front of her.
Smile Boys
DON'T USE THE FLASH!
[X Ray Camera takes the photo but it shows their bones and that of the painting]
[Q takes the X Ray Camera away from Pam]
Stop fiddling around with things you don't understand you might have killed him.
That's Odd
[Q takes photo away from her]

[At the Pan Am ticket counter]
Your passport please.
What's going on?
Some big drug dealer just escaped. Now, will that be smoking or non-smoking?
La Senorita Bouvier, don't I know you from somewhere?
No.
Oh, yes I do. You used to fly charter planes for some friends of mine. I got a job for you. Why don't we go outside and we talk in private.
Take your hands off her! She's with me.
Nobody's asking you gringo.
You're bloody lucky to be alive!
Its not luck, its experience.
Look, I just saved your life back there! If it wasn't for me your ass would have been nailed to the wall.
You saved my life?
Yes!
It's a tough business you picked, Miss Bouvier. Leave it to the professionals!
This is the master bedroom. I hope everything is satisfactory, Señor?
It's adequate. I'd like a case of champagne, Bollinger R.D.
Certainly, Señor.

[Looking through Bond's passport]
Well-traveled man.
Ah, Señor Bond. You'll be pleased to know your Uncle has arrived. I put him in your suite.
Thank you.
[Walks away from Hotel's Front Desk]
Your Uncle?
Let's make this a proper family reunion. Give me your gun.

Everyone and his brother is on the payroll. So, you - buy a mayor, chief of police, generals, presidents. One day you wake up and you own the whole god damn country. Then you take what you want. Banks. Government Casino. Airline concession. Why? Simple. It's easier for the politicians to take sliver, than lead.
